Issue.creator: markparz
Issue.summary: Create a description of why blockchain
Issue.description: Would like to build the story from the very high level down to the details of Hyperledger Fabric. This is the first phase, description of the very high level components of blockchain. Ultimately would like to move to the over arching Hyperledger project umbrella, then each project can build off of it. But wanted to start the story here, so for now will host within fabric doc.
